CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 4, 1952, pg. 1, reads: "Where Segregation Exists - Poor equipment and rundown fire houses, the usual pattern of segregation wherever you find it, exists in these two fire houses. The one on the left is Fire Station 58 on Allequippa Street.... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Fire Department station house 58, with tower on right, Allequippa Street, Hill District
